ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Elder Dragon is the language needed. Talarin Kal Amon, High Elven Wizard ... From: Lomack  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Elder Dragon is the language needed.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: Lomack <lomack@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 29, 1999 2:23 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Languages


> From: Lomack <lomack@...>
>
> Ok does anyone know what language is required to read Ipsor's
Enlightenment
> IV (or maybe its V I forget but its the only other one sold in Freeport)
>
> I am now Excelent in 23 languages. Among them are
> Old Erudin, Elder Elvish, Kobold (Elder Teir'Dal), Giant Toung (Combine
> Toung), and Dragon.
> Basically I am excelent in every language I have found so far. All 23 but
> I still cant read that book. Do I need to work each language up to
> "Master" or is there another Language out there that no one knows about
yet?
>
> Long Live the Brotherhood,
> Lomack, BCK-MoR
